readable.title: 3041384194_04316bd416
readable.content: A girl with a short haircut and eyebrow piercing bites her finger and crosses her arms . A very pale redheaded teen has her hand to her face thinking . A woman wearing a blue face is resting her finger beside her nose . A woman with red hair holds her hand to her mouth and looks pensive . Woman with short red hair stands alone with a worried look on her face .
